name: Paint brush
body:
### Welcome to paint_brush.
This a simple paint-brush example. Here you can download the source code for paint-brush.

```
$ cd any_directory_you_want
$ git clone https://github.com/aman2467/paint_brush.git
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Other repositories
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
